descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: Ben McLemore finds a wide-open Brandon Williams for three.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Brandon Williams drains the 3 from the wing) 2022/03/29 ESHEET

videos.headline: Brandon Williams drains the 3 from the wing

videos.description: Aaron Wiggins drives through his defender and knocks down the and-1 for the Thunder.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Aaron Wiggins bulldozes through his defender for the and-1) 2022/03/29 ESHEET

videos.headline: Aaron Wiggins bulldozes through his defender for the and-1

videos.description: Brandon Williams drives past two defenders and knocks down the basket to pull the Trail Blazers closer.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Brandon Williams drives and drains the bucket) 2022/03/29 ESHEET

videos.headline: Brandon Williams drives and drains the bucket

videos.description: Ben McLemore pulls up and knocks down the 3-pointer to take the lead late in the second quarter.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Ben McLemore drills the 3 to take the lead for the Trail Blazers 2022/03/29 ESHEET

videos.headline: Ben McLemore drills the 3 to take the lead for the Trail Blazers

videos.description: Keon Johnson is smooth as silk as he sinks the up-and-under bucket for the Trail Blazers.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Keon Johnson drains the smooth up-and-under basket) 2022/03/29 ESHEET

videos.headline: Keon Johnson drains the smooth up-and-under basket

videos.description: Drew Eubanks travels in time and knocks down the skyhook to extend the Trail Blazers' lead in the fourth quarter.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Drew Eubanks drains the skyhook for the Trail Blazers) 2022/03/29 ESHEET

videos.headline: Drew Eubanks drains the skyhook for the Trail Blazers

videos.description: Isaiah Roby pulls up and knocks down the clutch triple to send it overtime.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Isaiah Roby buries the clutch 3 to send it to OT for OKC) 2022/03/29 ESHEET

videos.headline: Isaiah Roby buries the clutch 3 to send it to OT for OKC

videos.description: Drew Eubanks soars through the paint and throws down the putback jam for the Trail Blazers.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Drew Eubanks with the nasty putback slam) 2022/03/29 ESHEET

videos.headline: Drew Eubanks with the nasty putback slam
